text_block_list.text:
Today is Winning Ticket's debut race,<n>a special day for the
fledgling runner.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, guys! Thanks sooo much for<n>coming all the way to
Hakodate to root<n>for me!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Of course! We'd do anything for a<n>teammate!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This is your time to shine. And we'll<n>cheer enough to make
up for the<n>members who couldn't come.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We'll hafta have one heck of a dinner<n>after the race!
Scallops and sea snails!<n>Rice bowls with crab, sea urchin,
and<n>salmon roe!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And melon parfaits! Don't forget the<n>melon parfaits!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uh... So the food's why you really<n>came?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what ever do you mean?! A fine<n>meal is simply a
bonus! Never mind<n>that—you need to concentrate!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, right. Focus, focus... All righty,<n>Trainer, I'm off!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Okay! This is my first step on the road<n>to the Derby! I've got
this win down!

Ticket heads toward her big dream,<n>fully confident in her
victory.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaagh! I looooost!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut it! How many times are you<n>gonna wail about losing?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob... Don't be so mean. We'vebeen friends since we started at theacademy. Can't you at least comfortme a little?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You'd still end up crying about it even<n>if I did.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah—because this is my start<n>toward the Derby, you
know? The<n>road's still so long, and I stumbled on<n>the first
step...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, you had such high hopes. I can<n>comprehend how you
must feel.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Riiight?! What am I gonna do if this<n>means I can never get
into the<n>Derby?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Enough already! Losing your debut<n>race doesn't mean your
dreams are<n>crushed!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I lost my debut, but I'm stillgonna show everyone one day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Precisely. You need to recover your<n>footing. Save the
despair for when<n>your dream is truly quashed.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, you've got an unstoppable<n>spirit, Taishin! And
Hayahide, you stay<n>cool on the outside and burn for a<n>
fight on the inside! I won't stay here<n>crying!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I can't stop if I wanna win the Derby!<n>Thanks, you two!
Nothing's better<n>than having friends by y-your...<n>
Uwaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: See, you ended up crying anyway!<n>Can't you just be quiet?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Her emotions are also her strength.<n>We'd do well to learn
from that.

The team is all together, putting some<n>needed training time
in.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nnnraaagh! To the Derbyyy!

Post-race training is usually light, but<n>Winning Ticket is
running with all her<n>might as if she has an upcoming race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Goodness... Ticket has so much<n>energy...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I thought she'd still be reeling after<n>yesterday. That's some
weird<n>enthusiasm.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She said her friends helped lift her<n>spirits. What wonderful
people they<n>must be to understand her dream.

It wouldn't make sense for us to<n>dwell on a single setback
when our<n>sights are set on the Derby.

Since she's still running toward her<n>dream with her head
held high, I have<n>to do all I can to help her achieve it!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Tickezo! Swing those arms harder!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Kaaay!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Pay attention to your stride! Keep<n>pushing it till the very end!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Pay attention to your stride! Keep<n>pushing it till the very end!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Pushing iiiiit! To the very eeend!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Phew! Finished!Thanks, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Good work. Don't forget to ice up to<n>get rid of that fatigue.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Good work. Don't forget to ice up to<n>get rid of that fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! But I thought I'd run just a little<n>bit longer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I might have lost my debut race, but<n>my friends have helped
me get over it,<n>and your passionate coaching has me<n>all
fired up again...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It feels like that loss wasn't fornothing. My drive for the Derby'sgotten even stronger!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What an oddball. But you're my kind<n>of oddball.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You have to keep up with her<n>passion, Trainer. Can you do
it?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No worries. That's exactly what I<n>intend to do. A trainer
never holds<n>back a racer from pushing forward.<n>Which is
why...
choice_data_list: Tickezo! You're racing again next week!
Tickezo! You're racing again next week!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No worries. That's exactly what I<n>intend to do. A trainer
never holds<n>back a racer from pushing forward.<n>Which is
why...
choice_data_list: Tickezo! You're racing again next week!
Tickezo! You're racing again next week!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Consecutive races?! That much<n>passion could be
dangerous!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Obviously your health takes priority.<n>But I think you've got
this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah... AAAGH! I'm gonna RACE!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna face this challenge<n>head-on and push through to
the<n>Derby! And we'll do it as a team,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeeeeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now Trainer's all fired up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Doubtless due to Ticket's influence.<n>I'm rather excited to
see how their<n>story unfolds.
Winning Ticket's story began with a<n>loss...
But she's only just starting out<n>toward her goal.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And it's Winning Ticket! Winning<n>Ticket wins the race!
Wooooo!

Winning Ticket overcomes the stress<n>of racing two weeks
in a row and<n>claims her first victory!
